patthana21.47:1.1: Nasāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.47:2.1: Naanāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.47:3.1: (Nasāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlassa purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.47:4.1: Naanāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
